segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is pouring out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t even seem to notice, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading fast, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and she’s still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’ve never seen someone so unaware of their surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the floor if she doesn’t turn it off soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m actually shocked by how calm she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is something you’d see in a cartoon, not real life.
segments.speaker: PAR
